Text: Tack! jag har väntat på denna filmen=)
varsegod, och det är DVDrip, jag råkade bara glömma och skriva in det...

den är från 2000 inte 2003!

Helskön film iaf :)! såg den på tv igår natt :)

The movie contains elements that can only be characterized as Jewish hate propaganda.  The depiction of white perpetrators of homosexual rape is in sharp contrast with reality.  Prison rape is an overwhelmingly black, and to a lesser degree hispanic, activity.

Here is a Human Rights Watch report substantiating this claim:

http://www.hrw.org/legacy/reports/2001/prison/report4.html
"Past studies have documented the prevalence of black on white sexual aggression in prison.(213) These findings are further confirmed by Human Rights Watch's own research. Overall, our correspondence and interviews with white, black, and Hispanic inmates convince us that white inmates are disproportionately targeted for abuse.(214) Although many whites reported being raped by white inmates, black on white abuse appears to be more common. To a much lesser extent, non-Hispanic whites also reported being victimized by Hispanic inmates."

Colombia Pictures and its parent Sony Corp of America are both Jewish-dominated and push their anti-European American agenda with patently false stereotypes that demean whites.
Please don't purchase anything produced them that will allow them to spread their poison.
